thread.section_title: Hotel Franklin D. Roosevelt - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Hotel Franklin D. Roosevelt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joi W
title: Great location!
text:
Very nice hotel with friendly staff. Very clean with comfortable beds. We opened the windows at night for a breeze because the thermostat was not in use. Close to shopping and restaurants. There was construction going on next door but it was fine for us since we spent most of the day out sightseeing.
Room Tip: We ordered a cot to add to the room and the staff was very accommodating. See more room tips
